article:
One day a tiger caught a fox in the forest. The tiger was _ to eat the fox. Just then the fox cried out, "You can't eat me. Don't you know that I am the king of the forest? If you eat me up, all the other animals in the forest will be very angry with you."
The tiger did not believe him. " _ can such a small animal be the king of the forest?" he asked himself.
"If you don't believe me," the fox said, "then take a _ with me in the forest. You will see whether they are afraid of me or not."
The tiger agreed to do so and they started off  together. The fox walked in front and the tiger went after the fox. When small animals saw the tiger coming, they ran away _ quickly as they could. That was what the fox wanted.
"See for _ , Mr. Tiger," the fox called out quickly, "the animals run away when they saw me."
"Yes, yes," the tiger said, "you are quite _ . You are really the king of the forest." Then he let the fox go away.
